resources.string:
• Can a longest road be broken if someone else builds a settlement along it? (rules say YES) 
• If no, can a longest road be made through someone else's settlement if built in from both sides? (state-dependent or history-dependent) 
• Can you bribe the robber? (rules say NO) 
• Can you do tradethroughs with port owners? (e.g. trade two sheep and a brick to the owner of the sheep port for a resource on your turn) (rules say NO) 
• Are trades for futures, certain build locations, or other non-card services permitted? (rules say NO)

This app was written by Conor Walsh as frootbirb.
